Comments: It was hard to remember which pieces had acted a certain way before, especially when they were really moved around
The reactions felt a bit random
The dialgue was pretty entertaining but a bit clunky at times
The moves seemed a little bit random
I couldnt tell if a piece had been conviced as the movement seemed to come out of nowhere a lot. The discussion was fun to follow though
the things being said would be far too long, stopped it feeling like a conversation
The justifications all sounded a bit the same when they were trying to convince each other
I couldnt really say what personality each piece had, but maybe after more time?
Sometimes the text was way too long and it didn’t feel natural
It did feel like a conversation was happening, but there wasn’t much emotion or anything to it
